name: streamWrapper.stream_seek
purpose: Seeks to specific location in a stream

return.description: Return TRUE if the position was updated, FALSE otherwise.

notes.description: If not implemented, FALSE is assumed as the return value.

Upon success, 
    streamWrapper::stream_tell is called directly after
    calling streamWrapper::stream_seek. If
    streamWrapper::stream_tell fails, the return
    value to the caller function will be set to FALSE
